import React from 'react'; export default class CardUI extends React.Component{ state={ imgBackground:'', title:'', starsState:'', description:'', attack:'', defense:'', year:'', firstedition:'checked' } starsdata=(event)=>{ this.setState({starsState:event.target.value}); var StarsVariable= event.target.value; var calculateDisplay= (StarsVariable==0)?'0': (StarsVariable==1)?'1': (StarsVariable==2)?'2': (StarsVariable==3)?'3': '4'; alert(calculateDisplay); } render(){ return(

{this.state.starsState}

Card Name

{this.state.stars}

{this.props.title}

) } }
